text:
Selena Gomez Says She ' s Most Like *This* ‘Friends’ Character

It appears we aren’t the only ones who take Friends very seriously.

Selena Gomez recently sat down for an interview with E! News, where she opened up about her personal life in a rapid fire round of questions. After discussing her two best friends—Raquelle Stevens and Courtney Barry—host Jason Kennedy prompted the actress to reveal which Friends character she relates to most. So, naturally, Gomez assigned roles to her squad before confirming that she is, in fact, a Rachel.

She said, “Courtney would be Monica, I would be Rachel, Raquel would be Phoebe, you [Kennedy] would be Ross. You’re like the dad!”

We’d take it as a compliment.

RELATED: Selena Gomez’s Second Coach Collection Includes Clothing (and Yes, We’re Excited)
